mobileResponsivenessTip: Improve the mobile navigation menu to be more intuitive and optimize images for faster loading on mobile devices.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize image sizes and leverage browser caching to speed up loading times.
seoOptimizationTip: Add proper meta descriptions, alt tags for images, and use heading tags (H1, H2) for better content structuring.
userExperienceTip: Simplify the homepage layout and provide clear call-to-action buttons to enhance user flow.
bookingFlowTip: Ensure the booking form is more streamlined and has fewer steps to reduce friction for users.
tips: Consider adding a live chat feature to improve customer support.
Ensure all images are properly compressed to reduce load times.
